code: import{GET_BOOKINGS}from"./actiontype";import axios from"axios";export var getBookingList=function getBookingList(){return function(dispatch){return axios.get("http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/booking/lists").then(function(response){dispatch({type:GET_BOOKINGS,payload:response.data});});};};export var confirmBooking=function confirmBooking(bookingid){return function(dispatch){return axios.get("http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/booking/confirm/"+bookingid).then(function(res){dispatch({type:GET_BOOKINGS,payload:res.data});});};};export var cancelBooking=function cancelBooking(bookingid){return function(dispatch){return axios.get("http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/booking/cancel/"+bookingid).then(function(res){dispatch({type:GET_BOOKINGS,payload:res.data});});};};
